column6: nj to the late martin and velma (burns) osterhoudt. she was a member of the ladies auxiliary in the bloomingdale volunteer fire dept and a member of the vfw post 8096 in butler. velma is survived by her daughter
column7: catherine matzura and linda gallone and her husband phillip
column9: marcella and holly. she was predeceased by her husband john and her children
column10: gloria matzura and gary matzura. a graveside service will be held wednesday
column12: 2015 at 10:00 am at mt. rest cemetery
